articles.description: Irrfan Khan Death: South actors Sai Pallavi and Dhanush took to their social media spaces and paid their tribute to Bollywood actor Irrfan Khan, after the news of his demise was confirmed by his family.

articles.title: Irrfan’s talent wasn’t recognised in the beginning, it was the industry’s fault, loss: Sudhir Mishra - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As the Indian film fraternity and fans mourn the loss of Irrfan, filmmaker Sudhir Mishra, who directed him in Yeh Saali Zindagi, says the acclaimed actor wanted to be “popular too, but on his own terms”.
articles.content: Sudhir Mishra sounds emotional while talking about Irrfan, his dear friend. For, talking about a friend who he “won’t be able to meet again doesn’t sound real”. Irrfan, 53, passed away today (April 29) after being admitted to a Mumbai hospital for a colon inf… [+3610 chars]

articles.title: When Saif Ali Khan was not allowed to meet his kids, Sara Ali Khan and Ibrahim Ali Khan - Bollywood Life
articles.description: About 15 years ago, Saif Ali Khan and Amrita Singh filed for divorce. He was in a relationship with a model due to which he wasn't allowed to meet his kids, Sara Ali Khan and Ibrahim Ali Khan. The Tashan actor had then opened up on his painful divorce.
